description:
Sweet simplicity for the active paddler. This life vest is designed to fit comfortably and securely, while allowing maximum freedom of movement. The low profile design features side entry with contour-cut foam and lots of adjustment options. One large pocket on the front keeps your sunscreen and other personal items handy.

  • 210-denier nylon ripstop is lightweight, quick-drying and durable
  • Adjustable shoulder straps are padded and contoured for comfort
  • Gaia PE foam is PVC-free, low profile, and shaped for maximum range of motion
  • Side entry with 3 adjustable buckles fits comfortably and securely
  • Large front zippered pocket with drain holes allows easy access to personal items
  • Front lash tab lets you attach a rescue knife
name: Kokatat Hustle PFD - Unisex
